peregrine.io.chunk
Interface ChunkReader

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Closeable, SequenceReader
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultChunkReader, LimitedChunkReader, ShuffleInputChunkReader
public interface ChunkReader
extends SequenceReader

Interface for reading data from a chunk in key/value form.

Method Summary
 int count()
          Return the number of unique key/value pairs.
 org.jboss.netty.buffer.ChannelBuffer getBuffer()
          Get the underlying ChannelBuffer behind this ChunkReader.
 int keyOffset()
          Return the offset of the start of the last read key.
 int recordOffset()
          Return the beginning of a record which can be used to read both the key and value pair which follow.
 
Methods inherited from interface peregrine.io.SequenceReader
close, hasNext, key, next, value

getBuffer

org.jboss.netty.buffer.ChannelBuffer getBuffer()
Get the underlying ChannelBuffer behind this ChunkReader. This is used so that the ChunkSorter can read data randomly after a sort.
